    • pickUpTiles

      public List<GameTile> pickUpTiles(int row1, int col1, int row2, int col2)
      Description copied from interface: IBoard
      Returns the list of tiles picked up from the board in a row (or column) from the specified coordinates. The given coordinates represent the start and end of the interval of tiles to pick up.
      Specified by:
      pickUpTiles in interface IBoard
      Parameters:
      row1 - start row.
      col1 - start column.
      row2 - end row.
      col2 - end column.
      Returns:
      the list of tiles.

    • canPickUpTiles

      public boolean canPickUpTiles(int row1, int col1, int row2, int col2)
      Description copied from interface: IBoard
      Checks if the selected interval of tiles can be picked up.
      Specified by:
      canPickUpTiles in interface IBoard
      Parameters:
      row1 - start row.
      col1 - start column.
      row2 - end row.
      col2 - end column.
      Returns:
      true if the selected range violates the rules: the tiles must have a free side to be picked up.
